alert.note: Alert for Logan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 27 at 8:35PM CDT until April 27 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN THOMAS...EASTERN LOGAN...SHERIDAN AND GOVE COUNTIES... At 835 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Grinnell to 3 miles southeast of Oakley, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 834 PM CDT, 59 mph winds were measured at the Oakley Airport. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Grinnell around 840 PM CDT. Grainfield around 850 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Gove. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 62 and 113. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
